name: Dark Souls
description: Dark Souls: Prepare to die edition for Steam
content:
files:
- dsfix: https://lutris.net/files/games/dark-souls/dsfix-xinput.tar.gz
game:
  appid: 211420
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DATA
    file: dsfix
- task:
    app: quartz
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: devenum
    arch: win32
    description: Installing devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: wmp9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Windows Media Player 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
winesteam:
  overrides:
    dinput8: native,builtin
    xinput1_3: native,builtin
  xinput: true
